name: Stupid Night at Fumo Reimu's
description:
you can Play the Game on Game Jolt if you want: https://gamejolt.com/games/dmigj64-8isfc3-p57n73-2mzsut-Pa9khqh-wmmqqj/698799

Warning!

This is Stupid, and it has Jumpscares.

Story:

you Play as Patchouli Knowledge who got Trapped in a Cabin, and you have to Defend Yourself from Possessed Fumos who want to Kill you. (Yes, that's the Story)
